node.text:
This 2.5 minute video will show you why we are SO MUCH MORE THAN WHISKEY. 🙏🏽💯

From the very beginning, when the 323-acre grounds were laid and the first buildings were constructed, we wanted to create something that would encompass the spirit of Nearest Green, the heart of Tennessee, and the love of our community; something special that would connect us in more ways through our similarities despite our differences. ❤️

Showcased in this video are some of the many faces and voices that share this journey with us. Watch and see the diversity of smiling faces that have traveled from all over the country. 🛩️🇺🇸

 Listen and hear the heartfelt stories of excitement and appreciation (a few of you may even see your own faces or hear your voices). 😊🙌🏽

In many ways the Nearest Green Distillery has become home to entrepreneurship, innovation, and celebration:

➡️ Whether you are coming to learn more about the story of Uncle Nearest and the history of American Whiskey - it’s here! 

➡️ Whether you are coming to meet the founders in person and have your bottles signed - it’s here! 

➡️ Whether you are looking for exclusive Uncle Nearest branded merchandise - it’s here! 

➡️ Whether you are coming to purchase the multi award-winning 1820 (next one drops THIS Saturday, 9/18 at 8:30am) or Masters Blend Edition to finally (as least for now) “Complete The Collection” - it’s here! 

At the Nearest Green Distillery, IT IS ALL HERE and for whatever reason you are coming to visit, you will leave knowing you were part of something magical. This is indeed something that you must experience for yourself. Take the pilgrimage and come visit us as we journey together. Cheers! 🥃

#UncleNearest #NearestGreenDistillery #MoreThanWhiskey #CompleteTheCollection #WhiskeyFamily

node.title: Welcome to the Nearest Green Distillery! 🙏🏽🥃💯

node.text:
This 2.5 minute video will show you why we are SO MUCH MORE THAN WHISKEY. 🙏🏽💯

From the very beginning, when the 323-acre grounds were laid and the first buildings were constructed, we wanted to create something that would encompass the spirit of Nearest Green, the heart of Tennessee, and the love of our community; something special that would connect us in more ways through our similarities despite our differences. ❤️

Showcased in this video are some of the many faces and voices that share this journey with us. Watch and see the diversity of smiling faces that have traveled from all over the country. 🛩️🇺🇸

 Listen and hear the heartfelt stories of excitement and appreciation (a few of you may even see your own faces or hear your voices). 😊🙌🏽

In many ways the Nearest Green Distillery has become home to entrepreneurship, innovation, and celebration:

➡️ Whether you are coming to learn more about the story of Uncle Nearest and the history of American Whiskey - it’s here! 

➡️ Whether you are coming to meet the founders in person and have your bottles signed - it’s here! 

➡️ Whether you are looking for exclusive Uncle Nearest branded merchandise - it’s here! 

➡️ Whether you are coming to purchase the multi award-winning 1820 (next one drops THIS Saturday, 9/18 at 8:30am) or Masters Blend Edition to finally (as least for now) “Complete The Collection” - it’s here! 

At the Nearest Green Distillery, IT IS ALL HERE and for whatever reason you are coming to visit, you will leave knowing you were part of something magical. This is indeed something that you must experience for yourself. Take the pilgrimage and come visit us as we journey together. Cheers! 🥃

#UncleNearest #NearestGreenDistillery #MoreThanWhiskey #CompleteTheCollection #WhiskeyFamily

node.text:
Yes, my friends you read it correctly - THE UNICORN IS BACK! 🤩🙌🏽

ONLY 167 BOTTLES of this RARE 11.5-year old 1820 barrel was produced and the crazy thing is that this is ALL BY MISTAKE! 😲

HERE’S HOW IT HAPPENED:
 ⁣
As you know, we only bottle our 1820 at 108-proof or above. However, in 2019, there were three 1820 barrels tasted that although below our required 108-proof, were so spectacular, they were set aside to determine at a later date what we’d do with them. Then, during our normal 1820 bottling run, these three were mistakenly bottled.⁣🤦🏽

We decided to go ahead and sell them exclusively at the Distillery and sold out immediately. Every person who purchased these bottles was aware that these barrels were bottled by mistake, and thus, would be the rarest we’ve ever produced. ⁣🏆
⁣
BUT…then another unexpected mistake was recently discovered‼️
⁣
The bottles from this 11.5-year old 1820 barrel were stored in the back of our bonded warehouse…and forgotten about. No, this isn’t one of those made up “we forgot it was there” stories…we literally didn’t realize the cases never made it into our visitor center to be sold. Even though we paid the taxes on these bottles more than two years ago (and Lord knows our bottle taxes are HIGH), they’ve been sitting in our warehouse this entire time…⁣
⁣
HERE’S WHAT YOU DO:

1️⃣ Come to the Nearest Green Distillery in Shelbyville, TN

2️⃣ 1820 sale begins Saturday, September 18th at 8:30am. Distillery gates will open at 7:30am.

3️⃣ Limited to only ONE BOTTLE PER PERSON.

4️⃣ Get your bottle signed by Fawn Weaver! Fresh off her #CEOThankYouTour, founder @fawn.weaver will be at the distillery to sign each 1820 bottle!😄❤️

5️⃣ Although not required for purchase of the 1820, make a day of it and have a tour of the distillery. Our 90-minute tours are unlike any other…guaranteed! 👍🏽💯 You can book your tours in the link in our bio or at http://UncleNearest.com/Distillery.

And REMEMBER, when mistakes like these produce spectacular, AWARD-WINNING LIQUID GOLD, RUN, do not walk to Nearest Green Distillery!🏃🏽‍♀️🏃🏽‍♂️💨 See you soon!! 😉🥃 

#UncleNearest #CompleteTheCollection #RareWhiskey #MostAwardWinning

node.text:
#WHISKEYFAMILY, tomorrow marks the first day of BOURBON HERITAGE MONTH‼️ It’s time to grab your favorite Uncle Nearest expression and celebrate! 🎉

Did you know that in 2007 Senator Jim Bunning of Kentucky introduced Senate Resolution 294 which solidified September as National Bourbon Heritage Month in the U.S. and reinforced bourbon’s 1964 congressional designation as “America’s Native Spirit.” 🤩

Although made in Tennessee, Uncle Nearest follows all the same regulations as bourbon, with the addition of the Lincoln County Process. For anyone new to whiskey, the Lincoln County Process, which our namesake Nearest Green helped to perfect, is the process of filtering bourbon through sugar maple charcoal and is what gives Uncle Nearest its incredible smoothness. This unique process purifies BUT does not add anything keeping its status as a straight Bourbon whiskey fully intact.👌🏽💯

Our Master Blender and fifth-generation Nearest Green descendant, Victoria Eady Butler, continues the legacy of excellence as the first African American master blender for a major spirit brand.

No matter which #UncleNearest expression(s) you choose to enjoy, rest assured you are sipping LIQUID GOLD as Uncle Nearest is the MOST AWARDED Bourbon or American Whiskey of 2019, 2020, and 2021!! 😍🥇🏆

Check our events page for local Uncle Nearest events near you in September to celebrate (link in bio). 🗓️

Let's raise a glass to Nearest Green and all who have contributed to the legacy of America's Native Spirit. CHEERS and as always, DRINK HONORABLY! 🥃❤️

#NationalBourbonHeritageMonth #MoreThanWhiskey #Bourbon #Whiskey #Cheers

node.text:
If you haven’t been to the WORLD’S FIRST ever non-alcoholic SPEAKEASY, come see it at Nearest Green Distillery! 🥃💯

This past June, we were so HONORED to have over 100 descendants of Nearest Green, and more than 50 State Congressmen, Senators, Mayors and local legislators tour the Distillery before we opened to the public. 🙏🏽❤️ In the following images you will see their experience in this incredible space; however, this is something that you MUST SEE for yourself! 😄

When you visit, the first thing you may notice is not only the gorgeous decor, but also how each detail is with GREAT PURPOSE. This is an experience like none other with a very unique Tennessee history. Here are 3 things to note: ‼️

1️⃣ The name, Philo + Frank, is an homage to the parents of our founder, Fawn Weaver, both teetotalers. Philo is short for her mother, Philomina and Frank was her father. 🙏🏽

2️⃣ The design inspiration of the speakeasy pays tribute to the women of the Temperance and Suffrage Movements by honoring spaces that inspired women to use the power of their voices and actions to change the world. You'll learn about women like Ida B. Wells and the mother of Harry T. Burns, the Tennessee State legislator who cast the deciding vote that FINALLY granted women the right to vote in America, exactly 101 years ago. 💪🏽

3️⃣ The speakeasy honors those whose social reforms supported the improvement of the health, status and living conditions of our community—especially of women and children. 👩🏽‍💼❤️

👉🏽 SCHEDULE YOUR TOUR of the Nearest Green Distillery NOW by going to https://unclenearest.com/distillery . We can’t wait to see you!

#UncleNearest #MoreThanWhiskey #DrinkHonorably #WithPurpose #WorldsFirst #Speakeasy

Hey #Whiskeyfamily‼️2021 is shaping up to be another stellar award year for the Uncle Nearest portfolio.🌟 Just half way through 2021 and we are well on our way to defending the title of “Most Awarded American Whiskey or Bourbon” for our third year in a row! 🎉

We have already swept 14 Best in Class trophies from some of the most prestigious competitions around!! 🏆🥇 That’s not to mention the 9 Platinum and Double Platinums, 13 Double Golds and 35 Gold medals so far! 🔥 And the star of the show has been @victoriaeadybutler ‘s Master Blend. Wracking up top honors and wowing critics with its complexity and smoothness, it really is her most perfect blend yet! 👸🏾

Here are just a few of our portfolio’s award highlights:

🏆 Double Gold X2 and Best in Class @sfwspiritscomp (San Francisco World Spirits)

🏆 Chairman’s Trophy @ultimatespiritschallenge 

🏆 Platinum, 97 points @beveragetestinginstitute 

🏆 Double Gold @sipawards 

🏆 Gold medal sweep for all four Uncle Nearest whiskeys #americanwhiskeymasters

🏆 First Place #InternationalWhiskeyCompetition

🏆 Best American Whiskey and Double Platinum @ascotawards 

🏆 Spirit of the Year, World Whisky of the Year and Distillery of the Year @bartenderspiritsawards 

Thank you for your unwavering support. 🙏🏽 Together we will continue to cement the legacy of Nearest Green for every generation to come. 

#masterblend #morethanwhiskey #mostawarded #unclenearest

node.text:
In case you missed the news, Nearest Green Distillery has EXPANDED! ↔️

#Whiskeyfamily , we are hyped that we have secured an additional 53.12 acres to continue our buildout! 🔥 This gives us a total of over 323 acres of Liquid Gold Real Estate! 🙌🏾 💯

Part of the plan for this newly acquired acreage is to grow “The Field of Dreams,” our own organic non-GMO corn 🌽⭐️ that is essential to making our award-winning whiskey. As the demand for our premium portfolio of expressions continues to soar, we are dedicated to continuing our reign as the Most Awarded American Whiskey or Bourbon well into the future. 🥃 🏆

On June 19, 2021, Nearest Green Distillery, home of Uncle Nearest Premium Whiskey, celebrated its Phase 2 opening and the commemoration of the nationally recognized holiday of Juneteenth. Guests arrived in high spirits to walk the new grounds of the distillery and explore all the recent additions while sipping @fawn.weaver ‘s signature #GrownFolkMimosa .🥂❤️ 

“When we broke ground, we made history as the first distillery in America to be named after a Black person,” said Fawn Weaver, CEO, and founder of Uncle Nearest in a statement. “Every day, our brand continues to make history and we are finding more and more people wanting to celebrate this history with us at record numbers. Expanding our distillery allows us to increase our production capabilities, as well as to continue to enhance the guest experience, so every person who visits has a reason to return again and again.” 

✅ BOOK YOUR TOUR at http://unclenearest.com/distillery (link in bio). 

#unclenearest #morethanwhiskey #purposedriven

node.text:
Our founder and CEO @fawn.weaver is not messing around, y’all! 😄

Oh, y’all thought the July dates we posted was her entire CEO Thank You Tour?  She’ll be going hard in the paint through the end of September. Here’s the August dates drop! 😮

If you’re not following @fawn.weaver on her IG stories, you don’t know what you’re missing! Every weekday this summer, she’ll continue to travel state-to-state, dropping in on as many of the owners, managers, and staff in the hospitality industry as possible, to thank them personally for making Uncle Nearest the fastest-growing American whiskey brand in U.S. history! 🙌🏽🥃

It’s not only the industry folks that have made Uncle Nearest a hit… It is very much because of YOU, our #WhiskeyFamily - the everyday patrons and brand evangelists asking for Uncle Nearest by name and making sure its at your favorite, local spots.❤️💯 To show that love and appreciation, our incredible Master Blender, @victoriaeadybutler , is also continuing to visit cities nationwide for bottle signings, hosted dinners and speaking engagements. These ladies are out here MAKING MOVES, yet again, showing the world we are #MoreThanWhiskey‼️

Fawn’s schedule is being coordinated by our local Market Managers, so we don’t have details as to where she will be, but you can follow her @fawn.weaver to see if she visits your favorite spots. Our mouths have been watering over here watching her food and drink posts from coast to coast, so make sure to keep up with her tour! 👍🏽

P.S. Uncle Nearest will be on Martha’s Vineyard for a full week…and so will @victoriaeadybutler , @drinkinglikekitty and @jmadontherocks ! Swipe right to see all the events they’ll be hosting (and we’re guessing Fawn will be popping in too as she’ll also be on the island doing her thing 😉). For more event details visit: https://spiritsoftheisland.com/

#unclenearest #ceothankyoutour #marthasvineyard

node.text:
Our founder, owner and CEO, @fawn.weaver , may be the hardest working chief executive in the industry‼️ 💯 Just call her the James Brown of spirits. 🔥 Every day this summer, she’s landing in one of America’s greatest cities to thank the owners and GMs of the restaurants, bars and hotels that have helped make Uncle Nearest the fastest-growing American whiskey brand in U.S. history 🇺🇸 (11 straight quarters of growth ⬆️ above 100% 📈)!

While Fawn is traveling the country thanking all of the business owners and managers, our Master Blender and fifth-generation Nearest Green descendant, @victoriaeadybutler , is going city to city and thanking all of our #WhiskeyFamily with sold out events, bottle signings, and killing it in the press! 🗞️

Make sure you’re following them both on Instagram as they share their adventures of love, honor, laughter and whiskey along the way. 💯

By the way, @fawn.weaver ❤️’s to eat great food 😋, so some have said her IG is part inspirational life lessons and part food and drinks blog… We just might agree… 😉🥳 Not to mention, her #SundayWithTheWeavers has become must-see IGTV. It did, after all, birth the Grown Folk Mimosa! 🥃🥂🍊

PRO-TIP: When visiting @nearestgreendistillery this summer, make sure to ask for @fawn.weaver on Saturdays and @victoriaeadybutler on Sundays as there is a very good chance one of them will be there…AND…signing bottles! 🎤

LESS THAN ONE WEEK LEFT #Whiskeyfamily!!! ⏰ Our 2021 #HonorYourLegacy Cocktail Competition entries are due next Monday, July 19th 2021 by 11:59pm PT, so if you’re a bartender planning to enter, now’s the time! A trip to Nearest Green Distillery to make your cocktail for @fawn.weaver and @victoriaeadybutler is on the line 🔥 along with the opportunity to have your drink featured on the menu of Humble Barron at Nearest Green Distillery. You DO NOT want to miss this opportunity! See link in bio for the rules and details. 

And speaking of the competition, the killer cocktail pictured above comes from one of our 2020 #HonorYourLegacy winners, @melodieciji . Featuring Uncle Nearest 1884 🥃, grilled peaches 🍑 and ginger, it might be called Last Day of Summer, but it’s one we’ll be sipping all summer long! 

Last Day of Summer

Ingredients:

2oz Uncle Nearest 1884 Whiskey
1.5 oz fresh lime juice
1.5 oz grilled peach and ginger syrup
3 dashes Black walnut bitters
One small slice of peach

Grilled Peach and Ginger Syrup:

-2 sliced peaches grilled. I used cast iron grill pan, 4 dashes of liquid smoke and 2 drops of vanilla extract. Grilled peaches until nicely caramelized. 
-Roughly 2 inches of peeled and sliced fresh ginger root. Muddled in the sugar to release some
of the juices
1 cup water
1 cup sugar
Boil and simmer until desired flavor infusion. Set aside and let cool.

Method:

Add all liquid ingredients to a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake vigorously for 8-10 seconds. Double strain into a chilled coupe glass.
Garnish with a fresh peach slice.

The streets are talking and we are LOVING what they have to say!😍

Between the announcement of the $50M Uncle Nearest Venture Fund,💰 the introduction of our multi-award winning Master Blend Edition,🏆🏆🏆 the Nearest Green Distillery Phase II opening and an Executive Team that just won’t quit, the buzz around Uncle Nearest is louder than ever! 🙌🏽🔥

YES‼️ We have been quite busy and the world has definitely taken notice. We started this mission with a clear vision to cement the legacy of Nearest Green for generations to come and everyday we pound the rock for that very reason.💪🏽💯

SCROLL RIGHT ➡️ to see the impact that we as a #WhiskeyFamily are making.

#unclenearest #morethanwhiskey #cominginhot #purposedriven #poundtherock

node.text:
CALLING ALL BARTENDERS‼️ It’s time for the second annual #honoryourlegacy cocktail competition, and to up the ante this year, a trip to visit Nearest Green Distillery is on the line! 🙌🏽🎉

It is our mission to preserve the legacy of Nearest Green for generations to come. Now, we want to hear about YOUR legacy and taste your best Uncle Nearest cocktail creation! 🥃🍹 More info and rules at unclenearest.com/honoryourlegacy (link in bio).

12 SEMI-FINALISTS WILL BE CHOSEN. EACH SEMI-FINALIST WILL RECEIVE $350 AND BE FEATURED ON OUR 2022 UNCLE NEAREST COCKTAIL CALENDAR WHICH WILL BE DISTRIBUTED NATIONWIDE! (SWIPE LEFT FOR EXAMPLE 😄)

FROM THESE 12 SEMI-FINALISTS, 3 FINALISTS WILL BE CHOSEN. THE 3 FINALISTS WILL RECEIVE A TRIP TO NEAREST GREEN DISTILLERY TO TOUR OUR FACILITIES AND MAKE THEIR COCKTAILS FOR OUR FOUNDERS AND MASTER BLENDER. 

1 WINNER 🏆 WILL BE CHOSEN AND THEIR COCKTAIL WILL BE FEATURED ON THE MENU OF HUMBLE BARON (THE WORLD'S LONGEST BAR) AT NEAREST GREEN DISTILLERY!! 🤩

We can’t wait to see what y’all come up with and look forward to honoring your legacy with you!

#unclenearest #cocktailcompetition #morethanwhiskey

node.text:
WHAT A CELEBRATION WE HAD‼️🎉  Thank you #whiskeyfamily for coming out to be a part of this moment in history. For those of you who couldn't join us, we can't wait to see you in Shelbyville soon! Here's a little peak of the events from our Nearest Green Distillery Phase 2 opening on 06.19.21. The 10 photo limit really can't do it justice! 📸
⁣
From the moment everyone walked into the newly unveiled Welcome Center, they knew this distillery was unlike any other. On display in the first foyer is the original millstone and artifacts from Distillery No. 7, where Nearest Green was head stiller in the 19th century. In the second foyer, commissioned oil paintings from the incomparable @raybonillapainter of 8 of Nearest Green's children and grandchildren. flanking both walls. Then there's the narrative walls of Tennessee Whiskey, Tennessee Walking Horses & Tennessee Music followed by an insane amount of Uncle Nearest retail, which leads to the world's first non-alcoholic speakeasy, Philo+Frank, _The_Barrel_House, the @kelseymontagueart #WhatLiftsUs Angel Wings, then onto our first single-story rickhouse, our Family Tasting Room, Master Blender House and so much more! Y’all, we did a thing in Phase Two!⁣
⁣
As this was also the celebration of Juneteenth (and the first year that it was recognized as a national holiday), there was so much life and energy to take in around every corner of the distillery. People laughed, sang, cried happy tears, danced and embraced one another. 🕺🏽💃🏽 Everyone present could feel that this was truly a MOVEMENT, not a MOMENT.💪🏽
   ⁣
Thank you to the more than 50 TN state Congressmen, House Representatives, Senators, Mayors, County Commissioners — and the Black Caucus who rolled in 26 deep — that came out to celebrate with us. WHAT AN HONOR!⁣
⁣
For those that were not able to attend thank you for joining us virtually on IGTV. We know y'all were with us in spirit!❤️ Thanks to our whiskey family for the huge support and to our amazing Uncle Nearest team for bringing this vision to life! ⁣

PHOTO CREDIT: @stacyprestonphotography @cfatke 
@karafayephotography @aussiebarcat 
  ⁣
#morethanwhiskey #unclenearest #nearestgreendistillery #juneteenth
